data.text:
There are things that the hotel can control and things they can't.
The hotel is fantastic however the room that we occupied was extremely tired and was in desperate of a makeover.  It was very clean and tidy but dated.
The Seabreeze restaurant, for us, was the jewel in the Nile.  Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner are brilliant with the staff always ready to satisfy your needs.
The beach with Abdul, Sulaimon and the rest of the staff were fantastic catering for your every need.  
Things not in control of the hotel are loud Italians and even louder and rude Russians who will invade every space, on the beach, that they feel fit.  The sunbeds are plenty but shade is a premium which the Russians have no hesitation in occupying, regardless of whoever is already there.
All of the staff are very friendly and helpful so if you do need anything just ask and don't complain afterwards.  They all work extremely hard all day, especially on the beach, so be nice to them and maybe reward them. 
Music on the beach is far too unnecessarily loud so try and get as far away from the sound system as possible.  There was some kind of children's party at the beach restaurant which was cruel as the extremely loud music was playing next to them without the children having ear protection.
data.title: Regular visitor.

user_location.name: Brough, East Riding of Yorkshire, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Adrian

firstly we would like to thank you for your review, We're glad to hear about your experience at our property.

Considering your many positive comments about our staff and hotel service.
we hope to welcome you back to our place.
Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to hosting you again.
owner_response.author: Mehmet  Aydin

data.text:
We have just returned from a two week holiday in March where we stayed at the Reef Oasis Blue Bay & Spa hotel. This is our third stay at this hotel and yet again we were not disappointed. The hotel layout, pools and restaurants are perfect and accommodation is set in beautifully maintained gardens.
However it is the overwhelming kindness and willingness of the staff who endeavour to make your stay as pleasurable as possible.
The guest relation ladies, Simone, Emma and Amy are always so helpful always there with a smile and ready to help with the booking of restaurants, checking of rooms and any advice you may need during your stay.
The rooms are a little dated but are cleaned and replacement towels provided every day of your stay. Our cleaner was called Hamdy and I have never known anyone work so hard, every day a cheery greeting and checking to see if we need anything. 
Also I canâ€™t leave this review without mentioning the waiters in all the restaurants who work tirelessly to serve you food and drinks. They are so friendly and it was lovely to see a few familiar faces. We joke with one of the waiters, Mahmoud, but who calls himself Ashley Cole ðŸ˜€, but they are all so helpful.
In addition the managers too are supportive of their staff and on many occasions during our stay we saw examples of them helping their colleagues at busy times in the restaurants.
In addition we just wanted to say a big thank you to Mr Reder, he oversees all the food/restaurants and is so personable. He interacts with all the guests, checking they are happy with the food. We have to say the food in the restaurants is excellent and so much variety, buffet, Fishermanâ€™s Restaurant, French Restaurant and A La Carte dining (Indian/Chinese) and our favourite The Italian Restaurant.
Thank you to everyone and weâ€™ll be seeing you again next year.
data.title: Excellent stay

data.text:
Only been here 5 days but just had to say how nice most of the staff are here. A special shout out to mohammed in the main restaurant by the window and Emma customer relations. The relax pool is so calm and well relaxing. They chaps there keep bringing drinks.  
There are a lot of Russians and Italians but everyone gets on well.
data.title: Great

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate the personal individual mention that surely will be passed to them.
owner_response.author: Mehmet  Aydin

data.text: From the moment we arrived and were greeted by Amy she took care of our check in  till the moment we left thoroughly spoilt by all the staff..the lad who cleaned our room and left us a different towel animal on our bed every day the waiters by adult pool who remembered what drinks we liked and at what time of day we wanted them...also waiters in the restaurant who always found us a table outside and kept us supplied with drinks...meeting with the general manager on our last night to provide feedback was a lovely touch...Great food cleanliness friendly helpful staff what more can u ask for we will be back thank you everyone for a great week
data.title: Great week

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,
Thank you for your review! We're glad to hear that you had a positive experience at our property.
We appreciate your feedback regarding our staff. We'll consider your comments to ensure a more enjoyable and peaceful environment for our guests in the future.
We hope to welcome you back to our beautiful place, considering the many positive aspects you mentioned.
Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to hosting you again.

Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Mehmet  Aydin

data.text: Iâ€™m currently resting in this hotel, the service is very good, if we donâ€™t mention some of the waiters and the animation (Mahmud (Max)) he only works for money, the animation is not active and sometimes itâ€™s boring in this hotel too. Besides this waiter and the animation, all the best especially Fariz. He loves his job and treats tourists well, he is hardworking.
data.title: Animation is not really good.
